description: This file defines an interface class `IPluginStarter` for starting plugins in the 'Thunder' environment, including a pure virtual method `activatePlugin` that attempts to activate a plugin with specified retries and delay.

classes.name: IPluginStarter
classes.description: Interface to start a specified plugin, potentially implemented using JSON-RPC or COM-RPC.

methods.name: activatePlugin
methods.description: Attempts to activate a plugin with given maximum retries and delay between retries.
